definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
quilted cotton trousers/cotton-padded trousers (worn in winter)

sentences.english: I don't think a lady would sag.
sentences.chinese: 我想一位淑女是不會穿寬鬆褲的。

sentences.english: How much are these corduroy pants?
Pop dot long T collocation tooling tall waist trousers, small lovely overflow.
sentences.chinese: 波普圓點長T搭配工裝高腰褲，小可愛洋溢。

sentences.english: Classic-fitting golf pant in soft, lightweight cotton tissue chino.
sentences.chinese: 經典裝修高爾夫球褲，柔軟，輕便的棉花組織奇諾。

sentences.english: Supremely soft and pre-loved yoga pants for that perfect look, right from the start.
sentences.chinese: 超柔軟的瑜伽褲讓你第一眼就選中它。

sentences.english: And I know high-waisted jeans are coming back in style. But I just can't go there.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這種高腰褲又開始流行了，但我就是不喜歡。

sentences.english: One day, Tooth Girl and Small Pants ask Small Boy to go to Loaf Hill with them.
sentences.chinese: 有一日，哨牙妹同甩褲仔約粗眉仔去麪包山探險。

sentences.english: Tenths pants length, style hair with high heels, was tall and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 九分褲的長度，時尚髮型搭配高跟鞋，顯高又優雅。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a novel trousers, whose theory is to drive blood by inflated pressure.
sentences.chinese: 利用充氣壓迫驅血原理設計一種新型抗休克褲。

sentences.english: Never wear tweed coat and flannel trousers.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要穿花呢上衣配法蘭絨褲。

sentences.english: Obviously, the new zippered trouser owners had not yet discovered the experience of forgetting to zip-up.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，新拉鍊褲業主尚未發現了忘記拉鍊的經驗。

sentences.english: You'll be feeling pretty sweet in these comfy fleece pants.
sentences.chinese: 你會感覺相當舒適的羊毛褲這些甜。

sentences.english: This swimming pool forbids wearing seabeach trousers and white or transparent swimming sweater and pants.
sentences.chinese: 本泳池禁止穿著海灘褲以及白色或透明泳衣褲。

sentences.english: Gaucho pants work great by showing off your curves without being skin tight.
sentences.chinese: 高科大褲工作由炫耀而不會被皮膚緊你的曲線。
斜紋棉布褲可能是卡其色。

sentences.english: Oh, they´re my baby pants and shoes.
sentences.chinese: 哦，是我的嬰兒褲和嬰兒鞋。
